snippet: STAMLER--Joseph, Sr. The Directors and staff of New York Service for the Handicapped are deeply saddened by the passing of Joseph Stamler, Sr., who with his wife Susan have been longtime generous supporters of Camp Oakhurst. Their deep commitment to our work with children and adults with disabilities has also been expressed through Susan's long and valued service on our Board of Directors. The Stamler family's interest in the welfare of children and adults with disabilities has been so helpful to our mission to provide adapted facilities and scholarships so all could enjoy Camp Oakhurst. To Sue and to Joe's extended family we offer our heartfelt condolences. Marilyn Friedman, President; Robert Pacenza, Executive Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: STAMLER--Joseph, Sr. The Directors and staff of New York Service for the Handicapped are deeply saddened by the passing of Joseph Stamler, Sr., who with his wife Susan have been longtime generous supporters of Camp Oakhurst. Their deep commitment to our work with children and adults with disabilities has also been expressed through Susan's long and valued service on our Board of Directors. The Stamler family's interest in the welfare of children and adults with disabilities has been so helpful to our mission to provide adapted facilities and scholarships so all could enjoy Camp Oakhurst. To Sue and to Joe's extended family we offer our heartfelt condolences. Marilyn Friedman, President; Robert Pacenza, Executive Director 1/3
